title: Russell and Shirley Dermond ///Part 1/// 303
description:
Russell and Shirley Dermond ///Part 1/// 303

Part 1 of 2

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

On Tuesday, May 6th 2014 - A woman called Putnum County, Georgia 911. She reported she was at the home of friends checking on them. The elderly couple had been missing for days. She called because inside the home she found someone dead in the garage that she could not identify. This is a crime and mystery that continues to haunt the state of Georgia to this day. Join us in the garage as we discuss this fascinating case. Beer of the Week - Southern Pecan Nut Brown Ale by Lazy Magnolia Brewing Garage Grade - 3 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
